channel.title: The Scaling Tech Podcast
channel.description: Host Arin Sime, along with his guests, brings you the insights you need to handle all the human and technical aspects of managing a growing software team. Whether your team is 5 engineers or 100 engineers, you’ll find the inspiration and tips to navigate the challenges of complex technical teams. When in season, new episodes drop every other Tuesday!
channel.itunes:subtitle: If you’re leading a growing software engineering team, this is the podcast for you!
channel.itunes:author: Arin Sime
channel.itunes:summary: Host Arin Sime, along with his guests, brings you the insights you need to handle all the human and technical aspects of managing a growing software team. Whether your team is 5 engineers or 100 engineers, you’ll find the inspiration and tips to navigate the challenges of complex technical teams. When in season, new episodes drop every other Tuesday!

item.title: Managing Deployments and DevOps at Scale with Tom Elliott
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: What happens when your CI/CD pipeline becomes a bottleneck instead of a boost? How do internal tools empower—or block—engineering teams from shipping confidently? In this live episode of the Scaling Tech Podcast, we sit down with Tom Elliott, founder of Ocuroot and former Engineering Productivity lead at Yext, where he supported over 200 engineers through […]

item.title: The Right Way to Encourage AI in Tech Interviews with Anna J McDougall
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: AI is changing developer interviews—for better and worse. Take-home tests are becoming obsolete. CVs can’t be fully trusted. Even live interviews falter as AI helps candidates craft responses. To stay ahead of these changes, we must decide when to encourage AI in interviews, and when to limit it. It’s time to give live coding interviews […]

item.title: How Product Management Can Help Teams Tackle Tech Debt
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: Every team has to deal with tech debt, and they take a variety of approaches to how they address it within their team, and how involved product management is in those decisions. How should you allocate time for working on tech debt? Should it be represented on your roadmap? How should you prioritize tech debt […]

item.title: Mastering Tech Debt with Lou Franco of Greenwave Solution
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: Technical debt is a reality we all face in software development. It’s something we all manage, constantly making trade-offs about when and how to best tackle it. Today, we’re diving into the best team practices for addressing tech debt with expert software engineering leader Lou Franco. Lou is a software product development advisor and independent […]

item.title: LLM Strategy: Build vs. Buy with Jean-Louis Quéguiner of Gladia
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: The “build vs. buy” dilemma is a familiar challenge to software engineers, but with the rapid growth of AI and machine learning, it’s become even more nuanced. So, how should you approach this? We’ve got the perfect guest today to help you out! Meet Jean-Louis Quéguiner, Founder and CEO of Gladia. Gladia specializes in building […]

item.title: Leading Through Change With Lisa Rogoff of Launch Project
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: Episode Summary Change is a constant in every organization, but how leaders respond to it can truly define the outcome. Today, we’re joined by Lisa Rogoff, an expert in guiding leaders through times of transition and complexity. item.title: The Role of AI in Tech Teams with Mike Todasco of San Diego State University
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: AI has the potential to amplify our skills, spark our creativity, and help us innovate faster than ever before—if we use it right. In this episode of the Scaling Tech podcast, Arin sits down with Mike Todasco to discuss the use of AI in tech teams. Mike is a visiting fellow at San Diego State […]

item.title: Leading Effective One-On-Ones With Doug Ramirez
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: One-on-ones are one of the most powerful tools a leader has for driving both team and organizational growth. But without a clear and intentional approach, they can easily become just another meeting on the calendar. That’s why we’re thrilled to welcome Doug Ramirez to the podcast! Doug has a proven structured approach to leading impactful […]

item.title: Will GenAI Be Your Next Scrum Master?
item.dc:creator: Arin Sime
item.description: Generative AI is already transforming the way Agile teams operate. How far can it go? Can it take over the role of Scrumaster? In this special live episode of the Scaling Tech Podcast, host Arin Sime welcomes back past guest Sanjiv Augustine for a thought provoking discussion on hoe GenAI is shaping the future of […]
